Class NodeEd25519

Class NodeEd25519 describes a hyper-deterministic BIP32 node implementation, compatible with ed25519 EC-curve.

It is an implementation of BIP32 that is adapted to work with ED25519 ellyptic curve keys rather than secp256k1 keys.

This class uses features provided by the bitcoinjs/bip32 package and therefor is licensed under the BSD-2 Clause License as mentioned here.

see

https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0032.mediawiki

see

https://github.com/satoshilabs/slips/blob/master/slip-0010.md

see

https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32

see

https://github.com/nemtech/NIP/issues/12

since

0.2.0

identifier

  • get identifier(): Buffer

  • Inherited from DeterministicKey.identifier

    • Defined in Compat/DeterministicKey.ts:221

    Getter for the identifier of the key.

    The identifier is build as follows:

    • Step 1: Sha3-256 of the public key
    • Step 2: RIPEMD160 of the sha3 hash

Methods

derive

  • derive(index: number): NodeInterface

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.derive

    Overrides DeterministicKey.derive

    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:333

    Derive a child node with index.

    When the node is not neutered, an extended private key will be created and when the node is neutered, an extended public key will be created.

    This method is an overload of the bitcoinjs/bip32 package's derive method adapted to use our child key derivation functions CKDPriv and CKDPub.

    see

    https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0032.mediawiki#child-key-derivation-ckd-functions

    internal

    Do not use this method directly, please use the derivePath() method instead.

    Parameters

    • index: number

    Returns NodeInterface

deriveHardened

  • deriveHardened(index: number): NodeInterface

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.deriveHardened

    Overrides DeterministicKey.deriveHardened

    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:304

    Hardened child derivation (derives private key).

    internal

    Do not use this method directly, please use the derivePath() method instead.

    Parameters

    • index: number

    Returns NodeInterface

derivePath

  • derivePath(path: string): NodeInterface

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.derivePath

    Overrides DeterministicKey.derivePath

    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:264

    Generic child derivation.

    This method reads the derivation paths and uses derive and deriveHardened accordingly.

    Derivation paths starting with m/ are only possible with master nodes (for example created from seed).

    Parameters

    • path: string

    Returns NodeInterface

sign

  • sign(hash: Buffer): Buffer

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.sign

    Overrides DeterministicKey.sign

    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:370

    Sign binary data with current node.

    Overloads the bitcoinjs/bip32 method named sign in order to be ED25519 compliant and use tweetnacl with ed25519 instead of secp256k1.

    see

    https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32/blob/master/ts-src/bip32.ts#L277

    Parameters

    • hash: Buffer

      The binary data to sign.

    Returns Buffer

toBase58

  • toBase58(): string

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.toBase58

    Inherited from DeterministicKey.toBase58

    • Defined in Compat/DeterministicKey.ts:343

    Get the Base58 representation of said key.

    This method is modified to use the Network class to determine privateKey and publicKey prefixes (version field).

    The Base58 representation is laid on 78 bytes with following specification (with || concatenation operator) :

    version || depth || parent || index || chain code || priv/pub

    Private keys are prepended with 0x00, public keys are encoded in X9.62 format.

    see

    https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32/blob/master/src/bip32.js#L73

    access

    public

    Returns string

toWIF

  • toWIF(): string

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.toWIF

    Inherited from DeterministicKey.toWIF

    • Defined in Compat/DeterministicKey.ts:385

    Returns string

verify

  • verify(hash: Buffer, signature: Buffer): boolean

  • Implementation of NodeInterface.verify

    Overrides DeterministicKey.verify

    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:399

    Verify a signature signature for data hash with the current node.

    Overloads the bitcoinjs/bip32 method named verify in order to be ED25519 compliant and use tweetnacl with ed25519 instead of secp256k1.

    see

    https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32/blob/master/ts-src/bip32.ts#L281

    Parameters

    • hash: Buffer

      The binary data that was supposedly signed.

    • signature: Buffer

      The signature binary data that needs to be verified.

    Returns boolean

    Returns true for a valid signature, false otherwise.

Static fromBase58

  • fromBase58(inString: string, network: Network): NodeEd25519
    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:148

    Decode a base58 extended key payload into its' NodeEd25519 object representation.

    This method parses the base58 binary data and uses read fields to initialize a BIP32-ED25519 hyper-deterministic node.

    No ED25519 changes have been done here.

    see

    https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32/blob/master/ts-src/bip32.ts#L286

    Parameters

    • inString: string

      The base58 payload of the extended key.

    • network: Network

      (Optional) The network of the key.

    Returns NodeEd25519

Static fromSeed

  • fromSeed(seed: Buffer, network: Network, macType?: MACType): NodeEd25519
    • Defined in Curves/NodeEd25519.ts:111

    Create a hyper-deterministic ED25519 node from a binary seed.

    Depending on the curve algorithm, the seed is prepended with one of:

    • ed25519 seed for ed25519[-sha512] implementation (Network.SYMBOL)
    see

    https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bip32/blob/master/src/bip32.js#L258

    Parameters

    • seed: Buffer
    • network: Network
    • macType: MACType = MACType.HMAC

    Returns NodeEd25519
